nodes.text: Antipose IX was a planet located in the Centrality, a sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Sometime before the Galactic Civil War, the pleasure yacht Arleen ran year-long tours from the Oseon system to Antipose IX and Antipose XII.
Antipose IX was first mentioned in Lando Calrissian and the Mindharp of Sharu, a 1983 book written by L. Neil Smith.
